mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shoes(bno, cno, name, price, color, size) VALUES(#{brand.brandNo}, #{category.categoryNo}, #{shoesName}, #{price}, #{color}, #{size})
mapper.update: UPDATE shoes SET bno = if(bno = #{brand.brandNo},bno, #{brand.brandNo}), cno = if(cno = #{category.categoryNo}, cno, #{category.categoryNo}), name = if(name = #{shoesName}, name, #{shoesName}), price = if(price = #{price}, price, #{price}), color = if(color = #{color}, color, #{color}), size = if(size = #{size}, size, #{size}) WHERE sno = #{shoesNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shoes s WHERE s.sno = #{shoesNo}
